name: Cordoba & Morales - Salomones - Grand Salomone
additionalNotes: Cordoba & Morales is a Florida-based cigar company founded by the husband and wife team of Azarías "Z" and Emille Mustafa. The company's roots trace back over a century to 1906, with Z's grandmother, Celestina Córdoba Morales, passing down family tobacco field secrets. Although the present-day company was established in 2011, its primary mission remains to honor the family legacy. Each cigar crafted by Cordoba & Morales is imbued with love, representing the Mustafa family's commitment to fostering enduring and enjoyable relationships with cigar enthusiasts, ensuring that lighting up one of their cigars marks the beginning of a lifelong bond between the connoisseur and the company.
